09:37 <vmassol> good morning  
09:37 <vmassol> extension tests have been failing for a long time now  
09:37 <vmassol> 23:06:00.809 [Thread-1] INFO  o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - java.lang.ClassCastException: com.xpn.xwiki.objects.StringProperty cannot be cast to com.xpn.xwiki.objects.ListProperty  
09:37 <vmassol> 23:06:00.809 [Thread-1] INFO  o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - at com.xpn.xwiki.objects.BaseCollection.getListValue(BaseCollection.java:447) ~[xwiki-platform-legacy-oldcore-4.5-20130108.212915-31.jar:na]  
09:37 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-extension/1369/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.ui.repository/RepositoryTest/testAddExtension/  
09:40 <vmassol> guys; I'm going to delete the 4.4M1 jobs on ci  
09:40 <vmassol> and replace them with a 4.4 branch jobs  
09:45 <vmassol> seems I've killed jenkins trying to delete the jobs :)  
09:48 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
09:48 <vmassol> I wonder if I should kill it and restart it  
09:48 <vmassol> I'm worried about breaking something  
09:49 <vmassol> :)  
09:55 <vmassol> those jenkins scripts I created are awesome :)  
09:55 <vmassol> (self congratulations feels good! ;))

17:01 <vmassol> sdumitriu: good morning, is this issue something you have knowledge about to fix it? XWIKI-8274  
17:24 <sburjan> Hello everybody. I have found an issue when building my XAR project. This could be some issue on platform since 4.1.4. Here you have my pom.xml  http://pastebin.com/67VeDkNy from my maven project. If I use 4.1.4 it works, but if I use 4.2 or 4.3 it fails. Maybe an artefact wasn't deployed on maven repo ?  
17:26 <sburjan> I have the maven-enforcer plugin failing with the message [WARNING] Rule 0: org.apache.maven.plugins.enforcer.RequirePluginVersions failed with message:  
17:26 <sburjan> Some plugins are missing valid versions:(SNAPSHOT are not allowed )  
17:26 <sburjan> Best Practice is to always define plugin versions!. But as you can see, I am using hardcoded version without any SNAPSHOT in my pom.xml  
17:27 <sburjan> has anybody any idea about this ? I can build it ok with 4.1.4, so this does not block me. But this might be important to be known  
17:28 <sdumitriu> vmassol: I'll look at it  
17:47 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki
